SELECT b.rnum,b.MEMBER_ID, b.MEMBER_PASSWORD, b.MEMBER_NAME, b.MEMBER_NICNAME, b.MEMBER_EMAIL, b.MEMBER_PHONE, b.MEMBER_ADDR, b.MEMBER_GRADE, b.MEMBER_JOIN, b.MEMBER_ANIMAL, b.MEMBER_POINT, b.MEMBER_DR_INFO, b.MEMBER_NOTIFY FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum ,a.MEMBER_ID, a.MEMBER_PASSWORD, a.MEMBER_NAME, a.MEMBER_NICNAME, a.MEMBER_EMAIL, a.MEMBER_PHONE, a.MEMBER_ADDR, a.MEMBER_GRADE, a.MEMBER_JOIN, a.MEMBER_ANIMAL, a.MEMBER_POINT, a.MEMBER_DR_INFO, a.MEMBER_NOTIFY FROM( SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_JOIN, MEMBER_ANIMAL, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_DR_INFO, MEMBER_NOTIFY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GRADE = '전문의' ORDER BY MEMBER_ID DESC)a where rownum <= #{pageEnd})b where b.rnum >= #{pageBegin}
